# C++的类

  • 首先创建room 房子类
  • 然后再派生类汤臣一品
  • 使用

关于类与对象的特性即说明不细说,只讲使用。

示例不太好:但是设计到大部分类的语法

# 首先创建room 房子类

#include<string>
#pragma once

using namespace std;
class Room
{
	//房子的长宽高公开
public:
	double length;
	double width;
	double height;
	//面积													.
	double getArea();
	//构造函数
	Room(double length,double width,double height, string hourseOwner);
	//介绍 虚拟方法 派生类实现
	virtual void introduce() = 0;
	
protected:
	//房主私有
	string houseOwner;
};

//后面跟着实现 类的成员使用::符号
double Room::getArea()
{
	return length*width*height;
}

Room::Room(double length, double width, double height, string hourseOwner)
{
	this->height = height;
	this->length = length;
	this->width = width;
	this->houseOwner = hourseOwner;
}

# 然后再派生类汤臣一品

#pragma once
#include "Room.h"
class Tomson :
    public Room
{
public:
    //实现虚方法
    void introduce();

    Tomson(double length, double width, double height, string hourseOwner) :Room(length, width, height, hourseOwner) {

    }


private:
    double price = 99999;


};

void Tomson::introduce() {
	cout << "汤臣一品就是贵,平方数:"<< this->getArea()<<"价钱:"<<this->price<<"施主:"<<this->houseOwner << endl;
}

# 使用

#include<iostream>
#include "Tomson.h"
#include<xstring>
using namespace std;


int main() {
	string name = "zhanghe";
	Tomson room(100,50,50, name);
	Room *rptr = &room;

	cout << "面积:" << rptr->getArea() << endl;
	rptr->introduce();

	return 0;
}
